segments.text: I think this kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and no one is stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined by all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how messy this whole scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside is a complete mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
